creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pair of long indigo wraps with red and grey cross stitch embroidery strip along top edge; each has striped ribbon tie on one end; embroidery ends 12" from end without tie on a) and 12 1/2" from end on b); bottom edge selvedge
title: Pair of Leg Wraps
